Name: The Anonymous
Title: The Anonymous
Desc: To win up to $100,000, players must lead double lives to keep their true identities hidden.
LongDescription: Preparing oneself for the ultimate showdown of strategy, perception and deception; played in two worlds, 12 participants will live and work together face to face while skillfully concealing their true identities behind a digital handle online; communicating through a messaging system in their individual hideouts, players can say and do whatever they want for the good of their own game; in a battle of wits and tactics like never before, the stakes are high, with a grand prize of up to $100,000 awaiting the individual who exhibits unparalleled expertise in keeping their true identity hidden; staying anonymous to stay in the game.
